name: media
title: Media
description: Multimedia items for a taxon such as an image, audio or video.

fields.name: taxonID
fields.title: taxonID
fields.description: Pointer to the taxon referring to an existing Taxon.ID within this data package.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.title: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the metadata.yaml

fields.name: url
fields.title: url
fields.description: The URL that resolves to the media item itself, not a webpage that depicts it.

fields.name: type
fields.title: type
fields.description: The MIME-type of the media item the url identifies. Preferably the full type/subtype combination, e.g image/jpeg, but the primary type alone is sufficient (image, video, audio).

fields.name: link
fields.title: link
fields.description: Optional webpage from the source this media item is shown on.

fields.name: modified
fields.title: modified
fields.description: UTC timestamp in ISO format to represent the time the record was last modified.

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.title: modifiedBy
fields.description: Author identifier indicating the person who has last modified the record.
